description: Display text output with various formatting options and streaming support.

input_value.info: Text or data to be displayed as output.

template.info: Template string to format the output. Use {text} as placeholder for the input text.

clean_data.info: Whether to clean the data before converting to text.

output_format.info: Format for the output display (text, markdown, json, html).

preserve_whitespace.info: Whether to preserve leading and trailing whitespace in the output.

max_length.info: Maximum length of the output text (0 for unlimited).

show_line_numbers.info: Whether to display line numbers in the output.

prefix.info: Text to add before the output.

suffix.info: Text to add after the output.

enable_streaming.info: Whether to enable streaming output for generator inputs.
